title: Trofeo Alfredo Binda 2021: Video Debrief
content:
March 21, 2021

Rouleur's full breakdown of an excellent day of racing

Elisa Longo Borghini sealed a heavenly racing weekend for Trek-Segafredo with an emphatic escape to victory at the Trofeo Alfredo Binda, the second Women's WorldTour race of the season.

Giving race analysis with a sense of humour, cycling journalists Amy Jones and Joe Timms join Rouleur editor Andy McGrath. They dissect the Italian race why things didn't work for SD Worx, while touching on llama drama and picking a Pet of the Race.
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
